headline: Edison International (NYSE:EIX) Retains UBS Buy Rating Despite Financing Concerns
summary: Edison International (NYSE:EIX) ranks among the best stocks to buy for retirement. UBS retained its Buy rating for Edison International (NYSE:EIX), with a price target of $68 on August 20. According to UBS analyst Gregg Orrill, while the proposed ruling in Edison’s rate case permits the rate base as expected, debates and comments filed indicate […]
